name: Mental Health America
about: The year’s Mental Health America conference asks the question: 'Is mental health in the U.S. fit for the future?'

name: American Mental Health Counselors Association
about: This conference, held by the American Mental Health Counselors Association (AMHCA), is geared toward people in the mental health industry, including students and professionals.

name: Correctional Mental Health Conference
about: Self-proclaimed premier event in correctional mental healthcare, this two-day conference will focus on the unique needs of mental health in corrections.

name: NAMI National Convention
about: Every year, the National Alliance on Mental Illness (NAMI) holds their national convention to help spread the word that recovery is possible..
